What are the treatments for GLUT1 deficiency syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of GLUT1 deficiency syndrome:  - G1D Registry  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Glucose Transporter Type 1 Deficiency Syndrome  - Genetic Testing Registry: Glucose transporter type 1 deficiency syndrome  - The Glucose Transporter Type 1 Deficiency Syndrome Research Consortium (G1DRC)   T
